column4: Hi, Can anyone help me? I want to upgrade to Breezy, last time I tried it messed up my whole system, keyboard fatal mistakes, deleted the TTY's, ext
safe way to upgrade to Breezy?
how do I get that done?
done. aredy latest versions of boh packegues
open /etc/apt/sources.list .... replace all hoary to breezy
i hope you haven't installed stuff from other repos like marillat
done, no, not at all, just aMSN, Apache2, NOiP2
I'll leave it downloading the files, I'll check it in the morning
